QuestData.Title: What Kind of Name is Candy, Anyway?
QuestData.Description: Can you believe that Candy Cane! You know up until you "dealt" with Chip, she was dating him. Now she's going out with the Trade Prince!$B$BI just can't get over the fact that she betrayed you like that with your ex. Maybe you should head down into the Slave Pits and take care of her once and for all?
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Time to take out the trash!
QuestData.RewardText: Serves her right for stealing your man in the first place.
